name: GKState
desc: The abstract superclass for defining state-specific logic as part of a state machine.

items.name: var stateMachine: GKStateMachine?
items.desc: The state machine that owns this state object.

items.name: func isValidNextState(AnyClass) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether a state machine currently in this state is allowed to transition into the specified state.

items.name: func didEnter(from: GKState?)
items.desc: Performs custom actions when a state machine transitions into this state.

items.name: func update(deltaTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Performs custom actions when a state machine updates while in this state.

items.name: func willExit(to: GKState)
items.desc: Performs custom actions when a state machine transitions out of this state.
